content: आंगिरस {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (सी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) Descended from or referring to Aṅgiras. --सः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of Bṛhaspati, son of Aṅgiras; <ls>Ms. 2. 151.</ls> {@--2@} Descendants of Angiras (<ab>pl.</ab>). {@--3@} A particular Sūkta or hymn in the Atharvaveda. {@--4@} The soul. {@--5@} A Kṣatriya by will of Brahmā and by profession.
